thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 22 of 539
thread.title: Lexi

author: Lexi
title: Lexi
text: Well, the dress looked beautiful on the site. The model was probably a foot taller than I was. But the top was too big, the sleeves were too loose. The bottom looks excellent on my body. The mesh is hideous! I feel like it doesn't compliment my upper half at all. I thought there would be breast cups, but the Breast portion is sewn in. It's so weird on my body that it doesn't even look like a two piece. It looks like a one piece with a sliver of skin between the top and bottom of it. It's pretty, but not worth $350 dollars from your bank account. The good thing about the dress is that the sleeves aren't itchy at all, like most would think.
